page.title: 04TRADE IN MOORSHOLM
page.content: {SHOPS}(A)Post Office and General Dealer which supplies; postage, savings, Giro, Pensions, Bonds, Postal Orders, groceries, cards, sweets, footwear, ironmongery, papers, Calor gas. (B)Off licence and General Dealer which supplies; alcohol, cards, groceries, stationery, sweets, ironmongery. Both shops sell fresh fruit, vegetables, meats and frozen foods. Licensed premises + B&B {BUSINESSES}Plumber electrician, joiner-carpenter, plasterer, car mechanic, light removals, goat farm, dog & cat kennels with animal cemetery, 2 milk rounds. (1 Greentop) {MOBILE SHOPS}Baker, fish & chip van, butcher, fresh fish, 3 coal merchants, morning newspapers. Most shopping done in Guisborough but more local during inclement weather. Tourism does not affect trade.
